headline: The Bull Case For Dow (DOW) Could Change Following CTO Transition And Sustainability Power Shift
summary: Dow has announced that long-time Chief Technology Officer A.N. Sreeram will retire in June 2026, with Andre Argenton stepping in as Chief Technology and Sustainability Officer from January 2026, while director Rebecca B. Liebert has resigned following her appointment as Chair of Occidental Chemical Corporation’s board. This leadership reshuffle concentrates Dow’s global R&D, sustainability, and environment, health and safety oversight under one executive, underscoring how closely the company...
